title.rendered: “A Place Where Passion Becomes Profession”- Roshni Gupta

content.rendered:
Passion always leads you right into your purpose. If you are lucky enough to turn your passion into your profession, nothing can stop you from being the best version of yourself and top it all. Digiperformer Roshni Gupta has been a passionate Travel Blogger; she pursued her passion and turned it into her profession by completing her Digital Marketing course from Digiperform Basvanagudi. She has been placed in Trilliant Digital as a Digital Marketing Executive.  Read out her journey in her own words!

It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

I’m from Bangalore and am a Travel Blogger; recently I finished my Digital Marketing course from Digiperform. 

What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

I’ve always been interested in this subject. And later I got to know about the certification that Digiperform is providing; I thought this was the right thing to do. 

What exactly makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

There are definitely many things that make Digiperform standout but LMS is one of the best services that it has for the students. It makes everything so convenient.

Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Absolutely I would prefer it above all and I would, in fact, suggest young minds that are looking for something futuristic that they should consider Digiperform Digital Marketing certification. 

If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

I would for sure give it a 9/10.

Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

I want to be a Digital Marketing head and handle a team of Digital Marketers and keep learning and enhancing my skills.

If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

He/she should be willing to learn new concepts and keep themselves updated with the changing trends and be able to implement them in their work.

Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

The best place to learn Digital Marketing.
